This doesn't have tests because it is messing with POM dependencies and we don't have tests at that level
+1, looks good to me. I'm +1 for committing this to branch-2.7 as well.
Duplicate of HADOOP-12230 : funny, filed same jira twice; patch only on one, and someone else got the same patch in on the other.
